title: First record of the rare tubeshoulder Holtbyrnia anomala Krefft 1980 (Teleostei, Platytroctidae) in the southwest Atlantic
content:
Abstract

Holtbyrnia anomala is a bathypelagic platytroctid widely distributed in the Atlantic Ocean. In this contribution, we report, for the first time, the occurrence of this species in the tropical southwest Atlantic. A single specimen was collected in 2000 on the continental slope off Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, at an average depth of 1158â€‰m. This report also represents the first record of Holtbyrnia anomala in the Brazilian Economic Exclusive Zone.
author:
Lucas C. Garcia, 
Marcelo R. S. de Melo, 
Cristiano R. Moreira
